properties.displayName: Ensure web app redirects all HTTP traffic to HTTPS in Azure App Service 9.2.
properties.description: Azure Web Apps allows sites to run under both HTTP and HTTPS by default. Web apps can be accessed by anyone using non-secure HTTP links by default. Non-secure HTTP requests can be restricted and all HTTP requests redirected to the secure HTTPS port. It is recommended to enforce HTTPS-only traffic.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
